name: CommOpt
short_description:
The CommOpt project offers my implementation of the Community Optimization (CO) algorithm written in ANSI-C under the terms of GNU GPL 3.
CO draws its inspiration from the collective intelligence emerged by web communities and implements a behavioral model derived from the human behavior that can be observed within certain types of web communities like Wikipedia.
For a more detailed description of CO, the reader is referred to my introductory paper:

C. Veenhuis,
Community Optimization: Function Optimization by a Simulated Web Community,
Proc. of the 12th International Conference on Intelligent Systems Design and Applications (ISDA 2012), pp. 508-514, IEEE Catalog Number: CFP12394-CDR, ISBN: 978-1-4673-5118-8, Kochi, India, November 27 – 29, IEEE, 2012
summary: CommOpt implements the Community Optimization (CO) algorithm
